review.title: “Company that has guided me to restructure my career path and gave me new directions”
review.pros: Pros – Great mentor and senior management, good work life balance, extensive growth opportunities, career and salary growth has no limits if you have that potential, zeal to succeed and prove yourself, great training and development initiatives.
review.cons: Cons – The cross border employees need to know and interact with each other on regular basis, have periodic meetings, share views and discuss about business and on personal level to have a feeling that we all belong to one single organisation.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
